tongwei:
我比较认可edge。顺便贴一下它对最后生还者2的评价。
You can't argue that Naughty Dog hasn't thrown everything at this, and though its tendency towards maximalism doesn't always work, the results are frequently astonishing. This is the kind of game you get when you have unlimited budget and manpower and no one to say when - even if you wish sometimes that someone had. As a big-budget action game, then, The Last of Us Part II is almost without peer. As a sequel to that story, it is deeply, daringly, fascinatingly flawed.（90分）
谷歌翻译：您不能说“顽皮狗”并没有为此付出一切，尽管它趋向于极致主义的趋势并不总是奏效，但其结果常常令人惊讶。 当您有无限的预算和人力并且没有人说什么时候的时候，您会得到这种游戏-即使您有时希望有人说。 因此，作为大型预算动作游戏，《最后的我们》第二部分几乎没有同行。 作为该故事的续篇，它存在着深深，大胆，令人着迷的缺陷。
